title: Hecarim ult not fearing people!
body: Has anybody else had the problem with Hecarims ult not fearing people........this and other champs cc not working.....Whats Going on Rito!?!?

replies.body: I don't own hecarim but our team did notice the other day when our hecarim came to gank bot lane his fear didn't activate

No its a bug with the game Xin Zhao q doesn't knock up, Morgana r sometimes failing to stun, Yasuo q not knocking up 70% of the time (Stupid as hell when your team has no other form of knock up (XIN) to ult off, resulting in no r), and now Hecarim
There is no bugs of this sort in the game, its either due to the player experiencing the 'bugs' having connection problems and experiencing lag
could be lag or an enemy buff you didn't notice.. worth checking out though
